mapper.select: select o.order_id as orderId, o.order_number as orderNumber, o.product_id as productId, o.order_receiver as receiver, o.order_date as orderDate, o.order_unit_price as orderUnitPrice, o.order_delivery_charge as orderDeliveryCharge, o.order_point_used as orderPointUsed, o.order_request as orderRequest, o.order_address as orderAddress, o.order_state as orderState, p.product_main_image as productMainImage, p.product_title as productTitle from orders o join product p on o.product_id = p.product_id where o.member_id = #{memberId};
